mapper.select: select * from Event where Event_area= #{param1} and (Event_category=#{param2} or Event_category=#{param3} or Event_category=#{param4} or Event_category=#{param5} or Event_category=#{param6} or Event_category=#{param7} or Event_category=#{param8}) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM() FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

select * from Event where Event_area=#{param1} and Event_area2= #{param8} and (Event_category=#{param2} or Event_category=#{param3} or Event_category=#{param4} or Event_category=#{param5} or Event_category=#{param6} or Event_category=#{param7} or Event_category=#{param8}) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM() FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM Event WHERE Event_area = #{param1} AND Event_category != all (#{param2}, #{param3}) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM() FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM Event WHERE Event_area = #{param1} AND Event_category != all (#{param2}, #{param3}) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM() FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
